questions.question: 1. The Kinetic energy of an object of mass 1 Kg is 72 J. The momentum of the object is:

5. If the linear momentum of a moving object gets doubled due to application of a force, then its kinetic energy will
6. which of the energy is possessed by a horse running on a level road?
7. When the speed of a moving body is doubled?
8. What would be the momentum of the bullet and the gun before firing?

answers.a: the momentum of the bullet and the gun before firing would be zero
answers.b: the momentum of the bullet would be more than that of the gun
answers.c: the momentum of the gun would be more than that of the bullet
answers.d: both would have certain velocity and so have the same momentum
